item.title: How I Am Planning for Remote Working
item.description: Last week, I wrote about why I want to be working remotely and today I’ll be writing about the steps that I will be taking to achieve that. 1. Research on the high demand roles on Solana For everything that we do, we have to always do our research. So the first step is to find out what are the high demand positions there is in the Solana space. Some ideas that I would be searching from:
